TextBlock.Name: PAGE_MANAGELOANTERMS_PREFACE_TEXT
TextBlock.Literal: Note, when Loan Terms are changed, existing invoices will retain the Loan Terms applied to the invoice when it was created. All new invoices created will have the new Loan Terms applied to them.

TextBlock.Name: PAGE_REPORTSHOME_ACCOUNTSRECEIVABLE_DESCRIPTION_TEXT
TextBlock.Literal: View a listing of all the Receivables breakdowns for attorneys with open invoices. Viewing options include: Receivables, Receivables by Date, Past Due Receivables, Past Due Receivables by Date and Aging Report.

TextBlock.Name: PAGE_REPORTSHOME_ATTORNEYSTATEMENTS_DESCRIPTION_TEXT
TextBlock.Literal: View a breakdown of what each Attorney owes. Views include All Invoices For Attorney and Past Due Invoices.

TextBlock.Name: PAGE_REPORTSHOME_ATTORNEYLETTERS_DESCRIPTION_TEXT
TextBlock.Literal: Create the Attorney Letters to accompany the statements to be mailed out.

TextBlock.Name: PAGE_REPORTSHOME_ACCOUNTSPAYABLE_DESCRIPTION_TEXT
TextBlock.Literal: View a listing of all the Payables due during a specified time period.

TextBlock.Name: PAGE_REPORTSHOME_CASHREPORT_DESCRIPTION_TEXT
TextBlock.Literal: View a listing of Cash Collected during a specified time period. Viewing options include per attorney or all attorneys together.
